contentrichtext.text: '''New Republic''' may refer to: * ''[[The New Republic]]'', an American political commentary magazine * [[The New Republic (novel)|''The New Republic'' (novel)]], an 1878 satirical novel by William Hurrell Mallock * [[New Republic (Star Wars)]], a fictional government from the Expanded Universe of ''Star Wars'' * The New Republic, a fictional polity in the 2004 novel ''[[Singularity Sky]]'', by Charles Stross. * [[New Republic Brewing Company]], a nanobrewery located in College Station, TX. * [[New Republic (South Africa)]] (Afrikaans: ''Nieuwe Republiek''), a short-lived country in 1880s South Africa * New Republic, California, former name of [[Santa Rita, Monterey County, California]] * [[The New Republic (Romania)]], a political party in Romania * [[New Republic Party (South Africa)|New Republic Party]], a defunct political party in South Africa * The restored civilian government of Brazil since 1985; see [[History of Brazil since 1985]] {{disambig}}
